pages.title: Orbital Destabilization
pages.text: Earth has been knocked from its orbit and is drifting into deep space. The sun is shrinking in the sky. Temperatures are dropping.$(br2)This manual will help you survive what ORSA scientists have termed a "Frozen Dawn" — the slow death of a world losing its star.$(br2)$(italic)If you're reading this, congratulations — you're alive. The bar is low and you've cleared it. Let's keep that streak going.$()

pages.title: Key Survival Rules
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Go underground.$() Deeper = warmer. Below Y=0 is safest.$(li)$(bold)Secure heat early.$() Build Thermal Heaters before Phase 3.$(li)$(bold)Any roof traps air.$() In Phase 6, exposed surface = vacuum. Even a single block overhead protects you.$(li)$(bold)Stockpile fuel.$() Surface coal ore freezes in Phase 4.$(br2)$(italic)ORSA Wellness Division has rated your current survival odds at "non-zero." That's the nicest thing they've said about anyone on this planet.$()
